title: Apollo Tools 79-Piece General Tool Set - Comprehensive Home Repair Kit
description: The Apollo Tools 79-Piece General Tool Set is a comprehensive home repair kit designed for tackling a variety of tasks. This set includes 79 essential tools, all heat treated and chrome plated for durability and corrosion resistance. The set features a claw hammer, long nose pliers, adjustable wrench, precision screwdrivers, and more, providing everything you need for small repairs and DIY projects around the house. The tools come neatly organized in a sturdy blow-molded case, ensuring easy storage and portability. Perfect for hanging pictures, assembling furniture, and performing minor repairs, this tool set is an essential addition to any household.
key_features: Ideal for Home Repairs and DIY Projects
meta_title: Apollo Tools 79-Piece General Tool Set - Comprehensive Home Repair Kit
meta_description: Shop the Apollo Tools 79-Piece General Tool Set, a comprehensive home repair kit with essential tools for small repairs and DIY projects. Durable and organized for easy use.
